links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..60
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[1]==1, a[n]==(((-3)^n - 1) * a[n-1])/(-4)}, a, {n, 18}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 26 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n le 1 select 1 else ((-3)^n - 1)*Self(n-1)/(-4): n in [1..18]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 26 2012
